info.title: Microsoft Kaizala
info.description: Microsoft Kaizala is a mobile app that helps you connect with your entire mobile workforce and supply chain, organize and allocate tasks more efficiently with built-in and custom Actions, and get actionable information and insights to accelerate decision-making.

post.summary: Send text message to a group
post.description: This operation allows you to send a text message to a specific Kaizala group that you’re a member of.

get.summary: Get the list of actions on a group
get.description: This operation allows you to get the list of actions in a group.

post.summary: Send action on a group
post.description: This operation allows you to send an Action to a specific Kaizala group that you’re a member of.

post.summary: Send action on a group
post.description: This operation allows you to send an Action to a specific Kaizala group that you’re a member of.

post.summary: Send action reminder on a group
post.description: This operation allows you to send a reminder of an action to a specific Kaizala group that you’re a member of.

post.summary: Post like or comment to a message
post.description: This operation allows you to post like or comment to a message in a specific Kaizala group that you’re a member of.

post.summary: Send reply to a message
post.description: Send reply to a message.

get.summary: Get the list of action packages on a group
get.description: This operation allows you to get the list of action packages in a group.

post.summary: Create a group
post.description: This operation allows you to create a Kaizala group.

put.summary: Add an existing group as subgroup
put.description: This operation allows you to add an existing group as subgroup to another group.

post.summary: Create a subgroup
post.description: This operation allows creation of a subgroup within a group.

delete.description: This operation allows you to remove a subgroup as member of another group.

parameters.name: subGroupId
parameters.description: Enter an identifier for the sub-group.

put.description: This operation allows you to add a user to a group.
This operation allows you to add subscribers to a group.

delete.description: This operation allows you to remove a user from a group.

post.summary: Upload a media file
post.description: This operation allows you to upload a media file and generates MediaResource which can be used in other APIs to send data.

parameters.name: fileContent
parameters.description: The media should be in multipart form.

post.summary: Upload media from url
post.description: This operation allows you to upload the given media from URL and generates MediaResource which can be used in other APIs to send data.

post.summary: Upload media from attachment
post.description: This operation allows you to upload the given media from attachment and generates MediaResource which can be used in other APIs to send data.

get.description: Get Action body schema for the selected action type.
Select events you want to subscribe.
Select event IDs you want to subscribe.
Select event objects you want to subscribe.

get.summary: Get list of members for a group

get.description: Get schema for a selected action type.
Get schema for a selected action type.

post.summary: When a custom action is sent in a group
post.description: This operation is triggered when someone creates a custom action on a group.

post.summary: When there is an announcement sent in a group
post.description: This operation is triggered when someone sends an announcement action to a group.

post.summary: When a group is added as a member to a group
post.description: This operation is triggered when someone adds a subgroup to a group.

post.summary: When a group is removed as a member to a group
post.description: This operation is triggered when someone removes a subgroup from a group.

post.summary: When a member is added to a group
post.description: This operation is triggered when someone adds a member to a group.

post.summary: When a member is removed from a group
post.description: This operation is triggered when someone removes a member from a group.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Member has been removed from a group.

post.summary: When a survey is sent in a group
post.description: This operation is triggered when a survey is created on a group.

post.summary: When a text message is sent on a group
post.description: This operation is triggered when someone sends a text message on a group.

post.summary: When someone responds to a survey
post.description: This operation is triggered when someone responds to an existing survey posted on a group.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Response to a survey has been posted.

post.summary: When there is an attachment sent in a group
post.description: This operation is triggered when someone sends an attachment action to a group.

post.summary: When someone responds to a custom action
post.description: This operation is triggered when someone responds to a custom action posted on a group.

x-ms-notification-content.description: Response to a custom Action has been sent.

post.summary: When an existing group member registers on Kaizala for the first time
post.description: This operation is triggered when an existing group member registers on Kaizala. In Kaizala, group admin(s) can add user even if he is not on Kaizala

subscribers.description: Enter Mobile numbers with country code (for e.g. +911234567890,+916810870005)
Enter Mobile numbers with country code (for e.g. +911234567890,+916810870005)

actionId.description: Action instance Id. It can be used to query responses using Get Action Details.

id.description: Enter Action Package Id (Required for custom Actions).

Name.description: Name of the group to be created.

WelcomeMessage.description: Enter a welcome message for the members of a group.

Members.description: Add members (for e.g. +911234567890,+916810870005) to the created group.

ShortDescriptionString.description: Enter a short description for the group.

LongDescriptionString.description: Enter a long description for the group.

groupId.title: Group Id
groupId.description: Group identifier of the created group.

Members.description: List of mobile numbers (for e.g. +911234567890,+912345678901 which need to be added.)

subscribers.description: List of mobile numbers (for e.g. +911234567890,+912345678901 which need to be added.)

mediaResource.title: Media Resource
mediaResource.description: Media Resource Identifier which can be used to send media (as attachment) to other apis.

subscribers.description: Enter Mobile numbers with country code (for e.g. +911234567890,+916810870005)

Comment.description: Enter the comment you want to post

message.description: Enter the message to be send as a reply.

groupId.description: Select a Group on which action will be performed.
